projects.title: Altair Gym – Motion Analysis
projects.description: Analyzes multivariate time series from wearable sensors to detect and quantify repetitive exercise movements, using both physics-based methods and deep learning approaches.
projects.fullDescription:
This project focuses on analyzing **wearable sensor data** collected during gym exercises, aiming to detect **repetitive movement patterns** in multivariate time series (accelerometer and gyroscope data along x, y, z axes).

Two main approaches were explored:

**1. Physics-based approach:** Direct analysis of the time series using **SciPy** to extract features such as peaks, frequencies, and repetitions, allowing precise identification of movement patterns.

**2. Deep learning approach:** Development of **convolutional neural networks (CNNs)** using **TensorFlow** to automatically detect patterns and classify exercise repetitions from the sensor data.

The workflow also involved **data preprocessing** with **NumPy and Pandas**, handling missing values, normalization, and synchronization of multivariate signals. Experiments were conducted on **Google Cloud Platform virtual machines** for computational efficiency, and all work was version-controlled with **Git**.

This project demonstrates a combination of **data-driven AI methods** and **physics-based analysis** to provide accurate and interpretable insights into exercise performance.

projects.title: Image classification of Jupyter's atmosphere
projects.description: Classifies five atmospheric patterns on Jupiter using unsupervised KMeans preprocessing and a One Versus Rest random forest model.
projects.fullDescription:
This project explores recognizing patterns in **Jupiter's atmosphere**. Hosted by the University Paris-Saclay, Telecom Paris, and Ecole Polytechnique, the objective is to classify **five different atmospheric patterns** of Jupiter.

The preprocessing phase involves dividing the images into segments using the **unsupervised KMeans model**, based on grouping similar pixels together, simplifying subsequent analysis.

In model construction, a **One Versus Rest** approach with a **random forest model** is employed, with each classifier fine-tuned to determine image class accurately.

projects.title: Classifying AI-generated text
projects.description: Capable of distinguishing AI-generated from human-written text, using advanced preprocessing and an optimized classifier for reliable accuracy.
projects.fullDescription:
This **Data Science** endeavor centers around the development of a **text classifier** capable of distinguishing between **AI-generated** and **human-written text**. Leveraging a **Kaggle dataset** containing diverse textual data, the project aims to explore the nuances between these two types of content.

The **preprocessing phase** involves utilizing advanced techniques such as **TF-IDF** and **word2vec embeddings** to transform the raw text into **feature representations** suitable for **machine learning models**. By extracting **semantic relationships** and **contextual information**, these methods enhance the effectiveness of the **classification system**.

Throughout the project, rigorous **experimentation** and **evaluation** of the **classifier** are conducted to assess its performance accurately. Various parameters are **fine-tuned** and **optimized** to enhance the **model's predictive capabilities** and ensure its **reliability** in identifying the origin of text samples.

projects.title: Stock Market Prediction
projects.description: A Random Forest model predicts a company’s Friday stock price using the past four days’ trends, after data cleaning, visualization, and feature preprocessing.
projects.fullDescription:
The goal of this project is to **predict** the **Friday stock market price** of a company based on the **trends of the past 4 days**.

The project consists of three main steps:

**Data preprocessing:** Cleaning the data by removing **missing values**, replacing **outliers**, and performing **normalization** and **encoding** of variables.

**Data visualization:** Exploring data through **visualizations** to understand **distributions**, analyze **feature relationships**, and determine the **most appropriate model type**.

**Model training:** Using a **Random Forest** algorithm, tuning **hyperparameters** for optimal performance, and evaluating with **MSE** and **MAE** metrics.

projects.title: Data Science library
projects.description: A C++ toolkit for efficient numerical computations, data manipulation, and neural network development.
projects.fullDescription:
**CMatrix:** A matrix management system specifically designed for performing advanced numerical calculations. CMatrix offers a range of features aimed at simplifying complex mathematical operations involving matrices, providing an efficient solution for computational tasks.

**CDataFrame:** A dataframe manager designed to facilitate the manipulation and analysis of structured data. CDataFrame offers sophisticated functionalities for importing, cleaning, filtering, and analyzing tabular data, enabling smooth and efficient data exploration.

**NeuralCPP:** A specialized library for simplified implementation of neural networks. NeuralCPP offers a comprehensive set of tools and functionalities for designing and training neural network models directly within the C++ environment.

projects.title: Predicting Romantic Matches
projects.description: Predicting whether two individuals can form a couple using a Random Forest model based on their preferences, personality traits, demographics, and optimized hyperparameters.
projects.fullDescription:
The objective of this project is to predict whether two single individuals can form a **couple** based on their **preferences**, **personality traits**, and other **demographic characteristics**.

The project is divided into three main steps: **data preprocessing**, **data visualization**, and **model training**:

In the **data preprocessing** step, we cleaned the data by removing **missing values** and replacing **outliers**. We also performed **normalization** of **numerical variables** and **encoding** of **categorical variables**.

In the **data visualization** step, we explored the **distribution of data** through **visualizations** to better understand the data distribution and analyze the **relationships** between different features. This helped us determine the most appropriate type of **model**

projects.title: Altair Gym – Mobile App
projects.description: Cross-platform mobile application for Altair Gym (iOS & Android) to track workouts, connect BLE bracelets, and manage content via a CMS and cloud backend.
projects.fullDescription:
This project is a **cross-platform mobile application** for **Altair Gym**, available on **iOS and Android**. The app enables users to **track their workouts**, connect with **BLE bracelets** for motion tracking, and access **dynamic content** managed via **Contentful CMS**.

Initially, **Firebase** was used for backend services, but the app was migrated to **Supabase** for authentication, database management, and real-time updates.

**Key features:**
- **Cross-platform support:** works seamlessly on both iOS and Android.
- **BLE connectivity:** connects with Altair Gym bracelets to capture and analyze workout movements.
- **Content management:** dynamic content powered by Contentful, allowing easy updates without redeploying the app.
- **Backend and database:** Supabase handles user data, authentication, and workout tracking.
- **App deployment:** available on **Play Store** and **App Store** with proper CI/CD and version management.

This project highlights a **modern mobile development stack**, integrating **hardware devices**, **cloud backend**, and **CMS-driven content** for an engaging user experience.

projects.title: Altair Gym – Marketing Website
projects.description: Responsive marketing website for Altair Gym, showcasing the product, managing newsletter subscriptions, and leveraging modern deployment and CI/CD workflows.
projects.fullDescription:
This project consists of a **responsive marketing website** for **Altair Gym**, deployed on **Vercel**. The website presents the **product**, its **features**, and allows visitors to **subscribe to newsletters** managed via **Supabase**.

The development used a **monorepo architecture** with **pnpm**, ensuring efficient dependency management and scalability.

**Key features:**
- **Responsive design:** optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile.
- **Newsletter subscription:** integrated with Supabase for secure and efficient user management.
- **CI/CD pipeline:** continuous integration and deployment to Vercel, enabling fast updates and version control.
- **Modern frontend stack:** built with Next.js for optimal performance and SEO.

This project demonstrates a combination of **full-stack development practices**, **modern deployment workflows**, and **user engagement features** for a tech product launch.

projects.title: Boat Booking Platform
projects.description: Boat booking platform, allowing clients to easily find and reserve boats, and owners to manage their fleets and reservations.
projects.fullDescription:
Web platform for **booking boats online** in France. **Clients** can **search** for **available rentals** in a region and **book** directly online, while **agency owners** can manage their **boats**, **employees**, and **reservations**. The project was completed as part of a **freelance mission**, with special attention to **security**, **reliability**, and **user experience**.

**Features**:
- **Search and booking for clients**: search by region, filter by boat type, capacity, and amenities, simple and fast online booking.
- **Agency management for owners**: create and manage rental agencies, track boats and employees.
- **Boat management**: add, modify, and remove boats for rental, track availability and detailed characteristics.
- **Reservation management**: view and track past and upcoming reservations, notifications for clients and owners.
- **Intuitive dashboard**: clear and responsive interface to easily manage all aspects of rentals, for both clients and owners.

projects.title: Appointment Management App for Businesses
projects.description: Oh Wow is a mobile app that helps businesses manage client appointments, services, and employees through an intuitive interface that streamlines scheduling and salon operations.
projects.fullDescription:
A **mobile application** that simplifies **managing client appointments** for businesses.

You can easily add and manage **services, employees, and contact information** for your salon.

The application also allows you to **schedule and manage appointments** for your clients, ensuring that you never miss an important meeting or reservation.

Oh Wow provides an **intuitive and user-friendly interface** that makes it easy to navigate and manage all aspects of your salon business, helping you **streamline operations** and provide **excellent service** to your clients.

projects.title: Time's App – Sport Workout Planner
projects.description: Time's App is a fitness application that helps users plan, schedule, and manage workouts efficiently to achieve their fitness goals.
projects.fullDescription:
**Time's App** is a **fitness application** designed to help you **plan and manage your workouts efficiently**.
With its **intuitive interface** and **easy-to-use features**, you can **create customized exercise sequences** and **set specific time durations** for each activity.
Additionally, the app comes with a **program planning system** that enables you to **schedule your workouts in advance**, so you never miss a session.
Whether you're a **beginner** or a **fitness enthusiast**, **Time's App** can help you **achieve your fitness goals** with ease.

projects.title: Altair Gym – BLE Bracelet Firmware
projects.description: Embedded firmware for Altair Gym bracelets, handling sensor data acquisition, BLE transmission, battery management, and device power states efficiently.
projects.fullDescription:
This project involves developing the **firmware** for the **Altair Gym BLE bracelets**, designed to reliably collect and transmit **sensor data** (accelerometer and gyroscope) to connected devices such as **smartphones or computers**.

**Key functionalities:**
- **BLE communication:** transmits real-time motion data to the connected app, optimized to minimize energy consumption.
- **Battery management:** monitors battery level and transmits status updates to the interface, ensuring safe operation.
- **Power state management:** handles turning the device **on and off**, and managing sleep/wake modes to extend battery life.
- **Optimization for low power consumption:** firmware is designed to reduce energy usage while maintaining accurate data acquisition and transmission.

This firmware combines **embedded systems expertise**, **efficient BLE communication**, and **battery-aware programming** to create a responsive and energy-efficient wearable device for fitness tracking.

projects.title: 3D Ulam Spiral
projects.description: 3D Ulam Spiral visualizes the distribution of prime, deficit, perfect, and abundant numbers in 3D using pyramid and cube models, with interactive rotation and highlighting features.
projects.fullDescription:
3D Ulam Spiral is a project, realized in Processing, which aims at representing in 3D the distribution of prime, deficit, perfect and abundant numbers.

Two geometric models, a pyramid and a cube, are composed of subcubes associated with a number n. The values of the subcubes are the images by the second degree polynomial associated to the models.

This programme was developed as part an academic project, in collaboration with collaboration with Pradana Aumars, at the University of Paris-Saclay.

Functionalities
To facilitate the visualisation of the models, it is possible to :

Control the speed and axis of rotation
Manually control the rotation
Change the coefficients of the second degree polynomials
Click on a sub-cube to highlight it in both models

projects.title: Paint
projects.description: A vector drawing application that lets users create, move, resize, color, layer, annotate, zoom, and save geometric shapes for structured illustrations.
projects.fullDescription:
This drawing application is designed to create vector shapes.

It allows users to draw solid geometric shapes, move them around, choose their color, resize them, and organize them in the foreground or background.

**Features**
- Draw solid geometric shapes to illustrate your ideas.
- Move shapes around to position them where you want.
- Customize the color of shapes to make them stand out.
- Resize shapes to fit your needs.
- Organize shapes in foreground or background to structure your drawing.
- Save your drawings to share them with your collaborators.
- Zoom in on your drawing to see details.
- Add text to annotate your drawing and clarify your ideas.

projects.title: Mini ML Interpreter
projects.description: Mini ML is a simple programming language in OCaml supporting arithmetic, booleans, functions, and recursion, featuring a lexer, parser, type checker, and interpreter.
projects.fullDescription:
Mini ML is a programming language that allows users to write and execute simple programs. The language is based on the ML programming language and is implemented in OCaml.

The language supports basic arithmetic and boolean operations, conditional statements. It also supports functions and recursion.

The project contains a lexer, a parser, a type checker and an interpreter : The lexer is responsible for tokenizing the input text into a list of tokens. The parser is responsible for parsing the tokens into an abstract syntax tree. The type checker is responsible for checking the types of the expressions in the program. Finally, the interpreter is responsible for executing the program.

projects.title: Password Manager
projects.description: A Python3 command-line tool to manage, modify, delete, and search passwords for single or multiple sites.
projects.fullDescription:
**Password Manager**
A command line application, developed with Python3, to manage your passwords.

**Controls**
- insert : to register a new password.
- modify : to modify an existing password.
- delete : to delete an existing password.
- search : to display information from a single site.
- search_all : to display informations from all sites.

projects.title: Ants simulation
projects.description: Simulation modeling competing ant colonies, focusing on pheromone-based communication and collective behavior, enhancing understanding of social insects and programming skills.
projects.fullDescription:
The project involved developing a **C++ simulation** using the **SFML library** to simulate competing **ant colonies** in their search for food. The objective was to model the behavior of ants in nature, specifically focusing on their **communication** and **navigation mechanisms** that rely on **pheromones**.

By running the simulation, it was possible to observe the competitive dynamics among **ant colonies**, their utilization of **pheromones** for communication, and the emergence of **collective behavior** from individual actions. This project deepened the understanding of **social insects** and enhanced **programming skills** in **C++** and **system modeling**.

projects.title: Game of Life Simulator
projects.description: Simulation of an interactive automated cell grid where users can manipulate cell states and observe life and death rules in action.
projects.fullDescription:
This project simulates an automated cell. The application creates a virtual grid where red cells are alive, and white cells are dead.

The simulation follows specific rules based on the number of neighboring cells: If a cell is alive and has less than two neighbors, it dies due to underpopulation. If it has more than three neighbors, it dies due to overpopulation. If a cell is dead and has exactly three neighbors, it comes to life, creating a new cell.

The user can interact with the simulation by clicking on the cells to change their state, allowing the creation of specific patterns. Additionally, the user can adjust the initial probability of living cells to customize the simulation further.

projects.title: Network Chat Server
projects.description: A Python Tkinter application enabling users to easily create and manage password-protected discussion servers with a simple and intuitive interface.
projects.fullDescription:
This project is a **computer application** developed with **Python's tkinter library** that allows users to create a **discussion group** on a **network**.

With this application, you can easily **create a server** and **invite other users** to connect by providing the **IP address** and **port number**. The **server** can be **password protected** to ensure only **authorized users** can join.

The application is **user-friendly**, making it **easy to create and launch a server**. The **user interface** is **simple and intuitive**, accessible to everyone. The **server owner** can **exclude users** or **change the password** as needed.

projects.title: Chrobot – A Unity Platformer Game
projects.description: A Unity platformer game with multiple maps, characters, and obstacles, where players collect coins to unlock new characters while testing their skills and reflexes.
projects.fullDescription:
This project is a **Unity-based platformer game** featuring **multiple maps**, **various characters**, **challenging obstacles**, and an **in-game store**, offering an engaging experience that tests players' **skills** and **reflexes** while providing hours of **entertainment**.

The game requires players to navigate each level carefully, avoid **dangerous obstacles** and **enemies**, and collect **coins** to unlock and purchase **new characters**.

projects.title: Thoughtful Quiz – A Unity General Knowledge Game
projects.description: A fast-paced, time-limited quiz game that challenges players’ general knowledge and lets them compete for high scores.
projects.fullDescription:
This Unity game is a **simplistic general knowledge quiz**. Players are given **60 seconds** to answer as many questions as possible.

Once the time runs out, a menu appears showing the player's **score** for the game, as well as the **best score** to challenge.

The game provides an **engaging** and **time-limited experience** where players can test their **knowledge across various categories**. It offers a **quick** and **entertaining** way to challenge oneself and compete for the **highest score**. Whether you're looking to have fun or improve your general knowledge, this quiz game is a **great choice**.
